metadata.title: CVE-2024-27068 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:thermal/drivers/mediatek/lvts_thermal: Fix a memory leak in an errorhandling path If devm_krealloc() fails, then 'efuse' is leaking. So free itto avoid a leak.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
